channel.title: Starting a server
channel.description: Hello, I'm new to programming and I really want to learn, if anyone is willing to teach me how to program my own RSPS from scratch, I would appreciate it! (Or maybe link me a tutorial from start to finish but it would have to be specific like how to do the teleports and shops and such.) THANKS!

item.title: Starting a server
item.dc:creator: @Revitalize Revitalize
item.description:
@Revitalize wrote:

Xamisya:

Hello, I’m new to programming and I really want to learn, if anyone is willing to teach me how to program my own RSPS from scratch, I would appreciate it! (Or maybe link me a tutorial from start to finish but it would have to be specific like how to do the teleports and shops and such.) THANKS!

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/

Look at those, all of those tutorials are THE best. Honestly, copying and pasting isn’t bad. But it’s like cheating on a test… You won’t learn anything. If you want to learn to code from scratch, download something like… Hyperion, it has good conventions and coding. It’s normally pretty blank as well. I’m just starting too, but I’ve taken some classes in school. Try coding a simple program to output “Hello world” or something. Just don’t put yourself in a box with programming. Good luck, I wish you the best.

P.S. Don’t start big, start small, IE: Don’t start off coding a private server before you code in java for a month or two, just to get the basics.

P.S.S. Shoot me a PM sometime and I’ll show how you to do some stuff.

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

“Coding teleports and shops” isn’t real programming. Go read some oracle documentation.
